basics.name: WENJUN YU
basics.headline: Senior C++ Developer | Backend Engineer Specialist

summary.name: Summary
summary.content: Highly skilled backend engineer with extensive expertise in C++ development and a proven track record of building robust, scalable systems. Adept at optimizing performance, resolving complex technical challenges, and implementing cutting-edge solutions in high-stakes environments. Demonstrated ability to lead projects, conduct thorough code reviews, and drive continuous improvement in system reliability and efficiency.

items.summary: Specialized in advanced optics and engineering principles, developing a strong foundation in complex problem-solving and analytical thinking.
Gained comprehensive knowledge in materials science and engineering, fostering a strong technical background applicable to software development.

• Spearheaded the development and maintenance of critical modules for the 5G Core Network Public Service System - OAM Project, with a focus on advanced data synchronization and configuration management techniques.

  • Led comprehensive code reviews, identifying and resolving high-priority issues to enhance code quality and system reliability, resulting in a 30% reduction in post-deployment faults.

  • Played a pivotal role in the OAM High-Reliability Architecture Improvement project, implementing offline data consistency comparison functionality that significantly boosted system reliability and data integrity.

  • Demonstrated expertise in memory leak detection and resolution using Valgrind, and efficiently diagnosed core dump issues utilizing Crash, improving system stability by 25%.

  • Innovated the deployment process by developing automated tools for the BM CAAS environment, reducing deployment time by 40% and enhancing overall maintenance efficiency.

  • Architected and implemented the Fault Tolerance (FT) design for the data sync module, successfully creating a robust FT module from the ground up that increased system uptime by 15%.

  • Designed and implemented a CI/CD pipeline, streamlining the development process and reducing time-to-market for new features by 20%.

items.name: XTP Quantitative Trading Interface Subscription Application
items.summary:
• Conceptualized and single-handedly developed a high-performance C++ application for XTP quantitative trading interface subscription, demonstrating strong initiative and technical proficiency.

  • Engineered an efficient system to subscribe to the XTP API, leveraging low-latency and high-concurrency techniques to retrieve real-time stock market information from securities exchanges.

  • Implemented robust architecture ensuring scalability and reliability, capable of handling large volumes of market data with minimal latency.

  • Designed and integrated advanced features to support sophisticated trading strategies, empowering traders with real-time market insights and automated decision-making capabilities.

  • Utilized best practices in software engineering throughout the development lifecycle, including thorough requirements analysis, modular design, rigorous testing, and seamless deployment.

  • Achieved exceptional performance metrics, with the application demonstrating a 50% reduction in data processing time compared to industry standards.

items.name: Core Competencies
items.description: Advanced algorithms & data structures, Design patterns, PostgreSQL, Linux systems, RESTful API development, CI/CD implementation, DevOps practices, Docker containerization, Git version control, Kubernetes orchestration, Requirements analysis & system design, STL optimization, Memory leak detection & resolution, Advanced debugging techniques, Performance profiling & optimization, Core dump analysis, Multithreading synchronization, Static & dynamic code analysis
